Key Match Events: Lane Thomas hit a grand slam off Tigers ace Tarik Skubal in the fifth inning
Post-Match Reflections: A.J. Hinch said, 'I have a heartbroken team for all the right reasons. We left everything on the field against a really good team'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Tigers missed a chance to make their eighth appearance in the ALCS since the divisional format was created in 1969
Others: The Guardians won the best-of-five Division Series, 3-2, and will advance to play the New York Yankees in the American League Championship Series beginning Monday night
